Terms of Use

Last Updated: August 28, 2021

OVERVIEW

Hello and Welcome to KIQKO.com KIQKO is a free online dating service that facilitate connections between adult individuals to find a connection ("KIQKO" or "we" or "us").

By creating a KIQKO account, whether through a mobile device, mobile application or computer (collectively, the ìServiceî) you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use (this ìAgreementî). Your continued use of KIQKO Dating (the "Website") you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use (this "Agreement"), whether or not you register as a member ("Member").

This Agreement sets out the legally binding terms of your use of the Website. The terms of this Agreement may be modified by KIQKO at any time, effective when posted by KIQKO on the Website. By using the Website, you represent and warrant that you have the right, authority and capacity to enter into this Agreement and to abide by all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement.

YOU UNDERSTAND THAT YOU ARE SOLELY RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR INTERACTIONS WITH OTHER MEMBERS. FURTHERMORE, YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT THE COMPANY CURRENTLY DOES NOT CONDUCT CRIMINAL BACKGROUND CHECKS ON ITS MEMBERS. THE COMPANY ALSO DOES NOT INQUIRE INTO THE BACKGROUNDS OF ALL OF ITS MEMBERS OR ATTEMPT TO VERIFY THE STATEMENTS OF ITS MEMBERS. THE COMPANY MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES AS TO THE CONDUCT OF MEMBERS. THE COMPANY RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CONDUCT ANY CRIMINAL BACKGROUND CHECK OR OTHER SCREENINGS (SUCH AS SEX OFFENDER REGISTER SEARCHES), AT ANY TIME AND USING AVAILABLE PUBLIC RECORDS.

ELIGIBILITY

Member Eligibility and Terms. If you wish to become a Member and communicate with other Members and make use of the KIQKO Dating service (the "Service"), read these Terms of Use and indicate your acceptance of them by following the instructions in the Registration process. You must be eighteen (18) years old or over to register as a member of KIQKO.com and use KIQKO. If you are under 18 years old, you are strictly prohibited from using the Services, and you may leave now. This Agreement sets out the legally binding terms of your membership in KIQKO. It may be modified by KIQKO from time to time, effective when posted by KIQKO on the Website. Membership in KIQKO is void where prohibited.

TERMS AND TERMINATION

This Agreement will remain in full force and effect while you use the Website and/or as a Member. You may terminate your membership at any time, for any reason by following the instructions on your in My Settings, or on receipt by KIQKO of your notice of termination by email, mail. KIQKO may terminate your membership for any reason, effective on sending notice to you at the email address you provide in your application for membership or another email notice address that KIQKO received from you. If KIQKO terminates your membership in KIQKO because you have breached the Agreement, you will not be entitled to any refund of unused subscription fees, if any. Even after this Agreement is terminated, the following provisions of this Agreement will remain in effect: sections VI-5, 10, 11, 13, 14 AND 15. Not respecting the terms of use mentioned in section VI can attract direct deletion of your account, and if repeated, banning of your access to KIQKO.com.

MEMBER ID AND PASSWORD

As part of the member registration process, you will be asked to select a Member ID (username) and password. We may refuse to accept any Member ID for any reason, including that the proposed Member ID impersonates someone else, is or may be illegal, is or may be protected by trademark or other proprietary rights law, is vulgar or otherwise offensive, or may cause confusion, as we determine in our sole discretion. You are responsible for the confidentiality and use of your Member ID and password and agree not to transfer or resell your use of or access to the Site to any third party. If you have reason to believe that your account is no longer secure, you must promptly change your password by updating your account information, available at the 'My Home' Page after logging on to KIQKO, and immediately notify us. YOU ARE SOLELY RESPONSIBLE FOR MAINTAINING THE CONFIDENTIALITY OF YOUR MEMBER ID (USERNAME) AND PASSWORD AND FOR ANY AND ALL ACTIVITIES THAT ARE CONDUCTED THROUGH YOUR ACCOUNT. YOU MAY NOT HAVE MORE THAN ONE ACCOUNT WITH KIQKO. Members that are found to have more than one account will get ALL their profiles terminated.

UNAUTHORIZED USE

The Website and KIQKO are for the personal use of individuals only, for purposes consistent with the Website and Service. You may not use the Website or Service in connection with any commercial or group activities. Organizations, companies or businesses may not become Members and may not use KIQKO or the Website for any purpose. Collecting Member IDs (usernames), or email addresses of members, or other information on the Website, by electronic or other means, is prohibited.

PROPRIETARY RIGHTS IN CONTENT ON KIQKO

KIQKO owns and retains all proprietary rights in the Website and KIQKO. The Website contains copyrighted materials, trademarks, and other proprietary information of KIQKO and its licensors. You may not copy, modify, publish, transmit, distribute, perform, display or sell any Website material or information.

  •        1. You are solely responsible for any materials (including profiles, photos or videos) and messages (including KIQKO.com Messenger messages) (collectively, "Content") that you publish or display (hereinafter, "post") on the Website or via KIQKO, or transmit to other Members.
  •        2. By posting Content to any public area of KIQKO, you automatically grant, and you represent and warrant that you have the right to grant, to KIQKO an irrevocable, perpetual, non-exclusive, fully paid, worldwide license to use, copy, perform, display, distribute and sell such information and content and to prepare derivative works of, or incorporate into other works, such information and content, and to grant and authorize sublicenses of the foregoing.
  •        3. You understand and agree that KIQKO may review and remove any Content that in the sole judgment of KIQKO violates this Agreement or which, in the sole discretion of KIQKO, might be offensive or illegal or might violate the rights of, harm, or threaten the safety of Members.
  •        4. The following is a partial list of the kind of Content that is prohibited on the Website. KIQKO reserves the right to investigate and take appropriate action in its sole discretion against anyone who violates this provision, including without limitation, removing the offending communication from the Website and Service and terminating the membership of such violators. It includes Content that:
  •        * may be offensive to Website users, such as Content that promotes racism, bigotry, hatred or physical harm of any kind against any group or individual;
  •        * harasses or advocates harassment of another person;
  •        * involves the transmission of "junk mail," "chain letters" or unsolicited mass mailing or "spamming";
  •        * promotes information that you know is false, misleading or promotes illegal activities or conduct that is abusive, threatening, pornographic, defamatory or libelous;
  •        * promotes or enables unauthorized copying of another person's copyrighted work, such as providing computer programs or links to them, providing information to circumvent manufacture-installed copy-protect devices, or providing music or links to music files;
  •        * contains restricted or password only access pages, or hidden pages or images (those not linked to or from another accessible page);
  •        * exploits anyone under the age of 18 in a sexual or violent manner;
  •        * solicits personal information from anyone under 18;
  •        * posts any content that expresses or promotes child pornography, bestiality, violence, rape, and other sex behavior punishable by law.
  •        * provides instructional information about illegal or potentially harmful activities such as making or buying illegal weapons, violating someone's privacy, or providing or creating computer viruses;
  •        * solicits passwords or personal identifying information for commercial, unauthorized or unlawful purposes from other users; and
  •        * engages in commercial activities and/or sales such as contests, sweepstakes, barter, advertising, and pyramid schemes.
  •        5. You must use the Website and in a manner consistent with any and all applicable laws and regulations.
  •        6. You may not include in your Member profile any telephone numbers, street addresses, last names, URLs pointing to personal profiles on other websites or email addresses. You may not include in your profile advertising of your own personal or business website or business.
  •        7. You may not engage in advertising to, or solicitation of, other Members to buy or sell any products or services through KIQKO other than the specified features on the website (Ads, Store, paid advertising). You may not transmit any chain letters or junk email to other Members. Although KIQKO cannot monitor the conduct of its Members off the Website, it is also a violation of these rules to use any information obtained from KIQKO in order to harass, abuse, or harm another person, or in order to contact, advertise to, solicit, or sell to any Member without their prior explicit consent. In order to protect our Members from such advertising or solicitation, KIQKO reserves the right to restrict t he number of emails that a Member may send to other Members in any 24-hour period to a number which KIQKO deems appropriate in its sole discretion.

WARNING

It is possible that other Members or users (including unauthorized users, or "hackers") may post or transmit offensive or obscene materials on the Website and that you may be involuntarily exposed to such offensive and obscene materials. It also is possible for others to obtain personal information about you due to your use of KIQKO, and that the recipient may use such information to harass or injure you. KIQKO is not responsible for the use of any personal information that you may choose to disclose on KIQKO. Please carefully select the type of information that you post on KIQKO or release to others.

COPYRIGHT POLICY

You may not post, distribute, or reproduce in any way any copyrighted material, trademarks, or other proprietary information without obtaining the prior written consent of the owner of such proprietary rights. Without limiting the foregoing, if you believe that your work has been copied and posted on KIQKO Dating in a way that constitutes copyright infringement, please provide our Copyright Agent with the following information: an electronic or physical signature of the person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright interest; a description of the copyrighted work that you claim has been infringed; a description of where the material that you claim is infringing is located on the Website; your address, telephone number, and email address; a written statement by you that you have a good faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law; a statement by you, made under penalty of perjury, that the above information in your notice is accurate and that you are the copyright owner or authorized to act on the copyright owner's behalf. KIQKO Copyright Agent for notice of claims of copyright infringement can be reached via e-mail (Subject: Copyright).

MEMBER DISPUTES

You are solely responsible for your interactions with other KIQKO Members. KIQKO reserves the right, but has no obligation, to monitor disputes between you and other Members, arising from or related to the Website.

PRIVACY

Use of the Website and of KIQKO is subject to our Privacy Policy, which is part of this Agreement with you. Information you submit in your profile, except for your e-mail address, real name and password, can be viewed by other visitors not only at KIQKO.com but also by means of search engines and third parties because this information becomes publicly available.

MOBILE APPLICATIONS

Mobile functionality of the Services may be provided for free, but please be aware that your carrier's normal rates and fees, such as message and data rates may still apply and you are solely responsible for those fees.

LOCATION-BASE SERVICES

We may offer features that are based on the location of Members and which may report on those Members' current locations (the " Location-Based Services"). Use of Location-Based Services is solely at your discretion. Should you use Location-Based Services, you consent to collection and dissemination of your location information through the Services. Under no circumstances shall we be liable for claims or for any damages there from, arising out of your informed decision to disseminate your location information together with your profile information through the Services.

COOKIES

We use cookies to store visitors preferences, record user-specific information on what pages users access or visit, customize Web page content based on visitors browser type or other information that the visitor sends. Ad servers: we try and bring you offers that are of interest to you, we have relationships with other companies like Google (www.google.com/adsense), etc. that place ads on our web site. As a result of your visit to our site, ad server companies, with the help of cookies, may collect information such as your domain type, your IP address and clickstream information. For further information, consult the privacy policy of Google at http://www.google.com/privacy.html.

LINKS TO OTHER WEBSITES

KIQKO.com may contain links to third party websites. These links are provided solely as a convenience to you. By linking to these websites, we do not create or have an affiliation with, or sponsor such third party websites. The inclusion of links within our Website does not constitute any endorsement, guarantee, warranty, or recommendation of such third party websites. KIQKO.com has no control over the legal documents and privacy practices of third party websites; as such, you access any such third party websites at your own risk.

DISCLAIMERS

KIQKO is not responsible for any incorrect or inaccurate Content posted on the Website or in connection with KIQKO.com, whether caused by users of the Website, Members or by any of the equipment or programming associated with or utilized in the Website KIQKO.com.

  •         * KIQKO is not responsible for the conduct, whether online or offline, of any user of the Website or Member of KIQKO.com.
  •         * KIQKO assumes no responsibility for any error, omission, interruption, deletion, defect, delay in operation or transmission, communications line failure, theft or destruction or unauthorized access to, or alteration of, user or Member communications.
  •        * KIQKO is not responsible for any problems or technical malfunction of any telephone network or lines, computer online systems, servers or providers, computer equipment, software, failure of email or players on account of technical problems or traffic congestion on the Internet or at the Website, including injury or damage to users and/or Members or to any other person's computer related to or resulting from participating or downloading materials in connection with the Website or in connection with KIQKO.
  •        * THE WEBSITE AND KIQKO.COM ARE PROVIDED "AS-IS" AND KIQKO EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ANY WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE OR NON-INFRINGEMENT, OR THAT THE WEBSITE OR KIQKO.COM WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE.
  •        * KIQKO.com cannot guarantee and does not promise any specific results from use of the Website and/or KIQKO Dating.

EXPORT CONTROL

Use of this Website is not subject to any export controls. Residents of any country may use KIQKO.

DISPUTES

If there is any dispute between us about or involving the Website or KIQKO, you agree that the dispute will be governed by the laws of the State of California, USA without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

INDEMNITY

You agree to indemnify and hold KIQKO, its subsidiaries, affiliates, officers, agents, and other partners and employees, harmless from any loss, liability, claim, or demand, including reasonable attorney's fees, made by any third party due to or arising out of your use of the Website or KIQKO in violation of this Agreement or arising from a breach of this Agreement or any breach of your representations and warranties set forth in this Agreement.

OTHER

This Agreement, accepted on your use of the Website and further affirmed by becoming a Member of KIQKO.com, contains the entire agreement between you and KIQKO regarding the use of the Website and KIQKO. If any provision of this Agreement is held invalid, the remainder of this Agreement shall continue in full force and effect.

KIQKO.com is a free online dating site. We do not sell, share, or rent any of your personal information to anyone. Your personal information includes your email addresses, date of birth, or any other personal information are kept confidential both online and offline. Reciprocal links exchange.

Please Contact us with any questions regarding this agreement.

I HAVE READ THIS AGREEMENT AND AGREE TO ALL OF THE PROVISIONS CONTAINED ABOVE.
